opcode.name: OP_Shroud
opcode.comment: Server putting players into shroud form

opcode.name: OP_GroupInvite
opcode.comment: You invite someone while ungrouped or get invited by someone ungrouped

opcode.name: OP_GroupInvite2
opcode.comment: You're inviting someone and you are grouped or get invited by a group

opcode.name: OP_GroupFollow
opcode.comment: You join a group or player joins group

opcode.name: OP_AAExpUpdate
opcode.comment: Receiving AA experience. Also when percent to AA changes.

opcode.name: OP_HPUpdate
opcode.comment: NpcHpUpdateCode Update HP % of a PC or NPC

opcode.name: OP_SpawnRename
opcode.comment: Spawns getting renamed after initial NewSpawn

opcode.name: OP_SpecialMesg
opcode.comment: Communicate textual info to client including hail responses etc

opcode.name: OP_ConsentResponse
opcode.comment: Server replying with consent information after /consent

opcode.name: OP_DenyResponse
opcode.comment: Server replying with deny information after /deny

opcode.name: OP_Action2
opcode.comment: Combat actions i.e. bash, kick etc

opcode.name: OP_ManaChange
opcode.comment: Mana change. Bards send this up with no size. Casters receive this for mana updates.

opcode.name: OP_ExpUpdate
opcode.comment: ExpUpdateCode - opcode looks to be 10a6 as of 08/17/12 but that value causes seg faults for some reason

opcode.name: OP_Trader
opcode.comment: PC's turning trader on and off

opcode.name: OP_WearChange
opcode.comment: Armor changes or give a pet a weapon (model changes)

opcode.name: OP_UIUpdate
opcode.comment: Seems to be sent to handle a variety of UI updates - Variable length

opcode.name: OP_GroupMemberList
opcode.comment: List of group members - Variable length

opcode.name: OP_GuildMemberList
opcode.comment: List of guild members - Variable length

opcode.name: OP_Marketplace
opcode.comment: Marketplace data - Guessing variable length (Big Packet 150k+)

opcode.name: OP_MarketplaceSelect
opcode.comment: Sent when highlighting an item in Marketplace - 80 bytes

opcode.name: OP_SelectCampfire
opcode.comment: Fellowship campfire Choices - Guessing variable length

opcode.name: OP_Claims
opcode.comment: Contents of claims window - Guessing variable length

opcode.name: OP_VoiceChat
opcode.comment: Voice chat server info - Variable length (Data sent when joining group,raid etc)

opcode.name: OP_PollQuestions
opcode.comment: SOE in-game player poll questions - Variable length

opcode.name: OP_ShroudTemplates
opcode.comment: Shroud templates to choose from on shroud NPC - 18983 bytes

opcode.name: OP_ExpandedGuildInfo
opcode.comment: Guild ranks and other misc guild data - Variable length

opcode.name: OP_GuildBank
opcode.comment: Guild bank contents - Guessing variable length

opcode.name: OP_TradeSkillCombine
opcode.comment: Tradeskill combine using new tradeskill window - 40 Bytes

opcode.name: OP_TradeSkillResult
opcode.comment: Packets sent when tradeskill combine successful - 12 Bytes

opcode.name: OP_TradeSkillCombineOld
opcode.comment: Tradeskill combine using old tradeskill window - 24 Bytes

opcode.name: OP_ItemPlayerPacket
opcode.comment: Inventory/bank items coming over during zone - Variable length

opcode.name: OP_TaskDescription
opcode.comment: Task descriptions coming down for task window - Variable length

opcode.name: OP_TaskActivity
opcode.comment: Task activity descriptions coming down for task window - Variable length

opcode.name: OP_CompletedTasks
opcode.comment: Task history for task window - Variable length

opcode.name: OP_Animation
opcode.comment: Combat animation, emote animations etc - 4 bytes

opcode.name: OP_TradeRequest2
opcode.comment: Someone requests a trade session with you or trade is cancelled - 8 bytes

opcode.name: OP_TradeDeny
opcode.comment: Target not ready to trade - 12 bytes

opcode.name: OP_TradeRequestAck
opcode.comment: Trade request recipient is acknowledging they are able to trade - 8 bytes

opcode.name: OP_TradeCoins
opcode.comment: You put coins put in a trade window - 20 bytes

opcode.name: OP_TradeCoins2
opcode.comment: Someone else puts coins put in your trade window - 12 bytes

opcode.name: OP_TradeAcceptClick
opcode.comment: One side clicks Accept on the trade 8 bytes

opcode.name: OP_TraderShop
opcode.comment: OpenTraderCode right-click on a trader in bazaar - 16 bytes

opcode.name: OP_AutoAttack2
opcode.comment: Attack on/off appears to be same as OP_AutoAttack - 4 bytes

opcode.name: OP_ClickDoor
opcode.comment: DoorOpenCode click request from client - 16 bytes

opcode.name: OP_MoveItem
opcode.comment: Client moving an item from one slot to another - 28 bytes

opcode.name: OP_TraderBuy
opcode.comment: buy from a trader in bazaar - 104 bytes

opcode.name: OP_TGB
opcode.comment: Client telling server to set targetgroupbuff - 4 bytes

opcode.name: OP_RaidInvite
opcode.comment: Client side raid invite requests 140 bytes

opcode.name: OP_RaidJoin
opcode.comment: Server side raid information - Variable length

opcode.name: OP_Feedback
opcode.comment: Client sending feedback to server - 1148 bytes

opcode.name: OP_GuildsList
opcode.comment: Listing of all guilds. Can be triggered by /lfg search?

opcode.name: OP_ClickInventory
opcode.comment: Click items from inventory or armor - 16 bytes 5th byte is Slot ID

opcode.name: OP_ClickInventoryAck
opcode.comment: Server acknowledges click from inventory or armor - 20 bytes

opcode.name: OP_BuffWindow
opcode.comment: Changes to buff window or song window - 100 bytes

opcode.name: OP_HouseAddress
opcode.comment: House and guildhall address information - Variable length

opcode.name: OP_HouseContents
opcode.comment: Server sending house information and contents - variable length

opcode.name: OP_FriendsList
opcode.comment: Server sending friends list contents - variable length (Sent when choosing "Welcome" form EQ button)

opcode.name: OP_FriendsOnline
opcode.comment: Friends currently online - variable length (Sent when choosing "Welcome" form EQ button)

opcode.name: OP_Rewards
opcode.comment: Server sending pending rewards - variable length

opcode.name: OP_FTPNags
opcode.comment: Free to play nags and other data - 1852 bytes

opcode.name: OP_TributeUpdate
opcode.comment: Tribute and trophy skills - Variable length

opcode.name: OP_Unknown1
opcode.comment: 3 byte opcode that spam logs. Marked here to make reading logs easier

opcode.name: OP_Unknown2
opcode.comment: 3 byte opcode that spam logs. Marked here to make reading logs easier

opcode.name: OP_Unknown3
opcode.comment: 3 byte opcode that spam logs. Marked here to make reading logs easier

opcode.name: OP_SendZonePoints
opcode.comment: Coords in a zone that will port you to another zone

opcode.name: OP_RequestZoneChange
opcode.comment: Send by server when a click causes zone. Also, origin

opcode.name: OP_AckPacket
opcode.comment: Appears to be generic ack at the presentation level

opcode.name: OP_SendExpZonein
opcode.comment: Both directions. Negotiating sending of exp info.

opcode.name: OP_AAAction
opcode.comment: Used for changing percent, buying? and activating skills

opcode.name: OP_GuildTributeStatus
opcode.comment: Guild tribute stats send on zone

opcode.name: OP_GuildTributeInfo
opcode.comment: Guild tribute loadout, only if on

opcode.name: OP_RespawnWindow
opcode.comment: Server telling client enough to populate the respawn window when you die

opcode.name: OP_InitialMobHealth
opcode.comment: Initial health sent when a player clicks on the mob. Subsequent updated will be OP_MobHealth

opcode.name: OP_MobHealth
opcode.comment: health sent when a player clicks on the mob

opcode.name: OP_Save
opcode.comment: Client asking server to save user state

opcode.name: OP_ConfirmDelete
opcode.comment: Client sends this to server to confirm op_deletespawn
